name: Ludus Kart Game
description:
This game prototype is the result of a one-day workshop on Blender where the students had to learn the basics and create their own vehicle 3D model and import them in a Unity pre-made Karting game.

Cherry on the cake, a small add-on using Mirror allows to play all-together with a local multiplayer mode though there are yet no collision detected and no real game mode. This was just to test the import of 3D models in Unity and the multiplayer.

To use the local multiplayer, one player has to host the game and the others join as client by entering the IP address (IPv4)  of the host player (on the same WIFI network).
